Text.val: -- Author: Stephan Huppertz
18.02.2014 SH SCR18728 Step 1: Extended test UFB552.po.TOTAL - GSBU_AMOUNTNODEC > PI.DEBH_REFERENCELIMITNEW with test
on PI.DEBH_REFERENCELIMITNEW = null
17.02.2014 GB SCR18728 Repleaced the ...or PI.DEBH_REFERENCELIMITNEW = NULL() by the ... or IsNull(PI.DEBH_REFERENCELIMITNEW)
03.12.2013 GB SCR18561 Step 1 Select all DEBTOR_CLIENT rows
04.09.2013 SH SCR18397 Step1 Changed tests to perform Step 1.1 Write messages in MQ127 (removed call of BDC154
and tests on BDC154 output parameter
30.08.2013 JH SCR18362 Removed step 1a
07.08.2013 SH SCR18326 Introduced NULL handling for both reference input parameters
24.04.2013 JH SCR18105 Removed external flag
16.11.2012 SH SCR17694 Added BDC154.PO.REINSURANCE_GRADE (skipped)
26.01.2012 JH SCR17003 Changed slection in Step 1a
23.12.2011 JH SCR17003 Deleted range on DEBC_FINANCE_LIMIT in Step 1a
09.12.2011 JH SCR16835 Splitted step 1 for handling of PI.AUTOMATIC Y/N
05.06.2010 GB SCR15539 Replacement calls the BMQ001 by the BMQ005
22.04.2009 SH SCR14579 Added SILO_ID
31.05.2006 SH SCR11380 Step1 Added translation of text for BMQ001.PI.TEXT to be
in CLNT205_EMP_CONTACT language
... store system language (BMQ001.PI.TEXT has to be translated to language of
CLNT205_EMP_CONTACT)
... reset variables
... prepare text for BMQ001.PI.TEXT (in language of CLNT205_EMP_CONTACT)
-- MQ127 (=Changes in reference limits)

ExpSyntax.val: MlsTrans ('Check all linked debtors on exceeding reflim')
